Test Name: Beta-2 Glycoprotein 1 Antibodies, IgG and IgM, Serum
Purpose: To measure IgG and IgM isotypes of Beta-2 Glycoprotein 1 antibodies for accurate diagnosis and management of autoimmune conditions such as antiphospholipid syndrome.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: ELISA plate reader, microplate washer, 37Â°C incubator, calibrated pipettes with disposable tips
